rules_text:
Flying
When Imperial Seraph enters the battlefield, you take imperium. [i](Creatures you cast enter the battlefield with an extra +1/+1 counter. You lose imperium at the end of your turn if you didn’t attack or cast a creature spell.)[/i]
Whenever a nontoken creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s an Angel Soldier.
